articles.content: Amidst the ongoing controversy related to Bigg Boss fame Pratik Sehjapal and actress Kashika Kapoor, several celebrities including Karan Kundrra, Nikki Tamboli, Umar Riaz and Andy have come out in su… [+2272 chars]

articles.title: BTS ARMY Now Believes Jungkook is Princess Diana Reincarnated, Here's Why - News18
articles.description: While one was the people’s princess, the other is one of the most popular idols in the K-pop industry. But what is the connection?

articles.title: Abhishek Bachchan reveals Aishwarya Rai teaches Aaradhya at home - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Abhishek Bachchan has opened up about how wife Aishwarya Rai helps their daughter Aaradhya at her studies, much like how Amitabh Bachchan used to help him in mathematics.
